About This Template

The client aimed to target campus students and faculty for graduation season, promoting stocked sets of gift products curated from Black creators. We decided to highlight 3 boxes in partifular, and reinforce secondary CTAs to highlight Corporate Gifting and the Free Shipping policy. We incorporated benefits from their Community webpage to introduce the brand and its mission to our list audience.

Key Features

Paired with Retargeting

A comprehensive set of web banner display ads were also created and retargeted in conjuction with the 2 send campaign.

Responsive Layout

Fully responsive design that looks great on all devices from desktop to mobile.

Brand Alignment

Closely follows brand standards set by client's home website

Design Notes

A CAN-SPAM compliant footer connected to our list is added post design approval and tested before launch.
